trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Ventura
There was one other sighting in Ventura on or around July 4th 2012
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsOK, I understand it's the Fourth Of July. There are Fireworks all over the skies. We are in the Pierpont area of Ventura. Did anyone else see an odd STATIONARY object in the sky S.- S.SW of the Pierpont, Marina Park area, over the ocean about 45 min.to an hour ago? It had no "regular" running lights. no white lights, primarily red & blue, similar to emergency lights. It was below the marine layer. Colors pulsated and switched colors and then became primarily red. The event lasted at least ten min, that I witnessed. There was no air traffic in the air at the moment I saw it, & the stars were not visible due to the overcast. PLEASE tell me somebody else saw this?
Summary: STATIONARY object in the sky S.- S.SW of the Pierpont, Marina Park area, over the ocean. no "regular" running lights. no white lights, primarily red & blue, similar to emergency lights
